channel-type.label: Power State
channel-type.description: This setting describes the current power state of the home appliance.

channel-type.label: Power State
channel-type.description: This setting describes the current power state of the home appliance.

channel-type.label: Door State
channel-type.description: This status describes the state of the door of the home appliance. A change of that status is either triggered by the user operating the home appliance locally (i.e. opening/closing door) or automatically by the home appliance (i.e. locking the door).

channel-type.label: Operation State
channel-type.description: This status describes the operation state of the home appliance.

channel-type.label: Remote Start Allowance State
channel-type.description: This status indicates whether the remote program start is enabled. This can happen due to a programmatic change (only disabling), or manually by the user changing the flag locally on the home appliance, or automatically after a certain duration - usually 24 hours.

channel-type.label: Remote Control Activation State
channel-type.description: This status indicates whether the allowance for remote controlling is enabled.

channel-type.label: Active Program
channel-type.description: This status describes the active program of the home appliance.

channel-type.label: Selected Program
channel-type.description: This status describes the selected program of the home appliance.

channel-type.label: Remaining program time
channel-type.description: This status indicates the remaining program time of the home appliance.

channel-type.label: Progress State
channel-type.description: This status describes the program progress of the home appliance.

channel-type.label: Cavity Temperature
channel-type.description: This status describes the oven cavity temperature of the home appliance.

channel-type.label: Elapsed Program Time
channel-type.description: This status describes the elapsed program time of the home appliance.

channel-type.label: Setpoint Temperature
channel-type.description: This status describes the intended cooking compartment temperature of the home appliance.

channel-type.label: Selected duration
channel-type.description: This status describes the duration of the program of the home appliance.

channel-type.label: Washing Program Temperature
channel-type.description: This status describes the temperature of the washing program of the home appliance.

channel-type.label: Spin Speed
channel-type.description: This status defines the spin speed of a washer program of the home appliance.

channel-type.label: Refrigerator temperature
channel-type.description: Target temperature of the refrigerator compartment (Range depends on appliance - common range 2 to 8°C).

channel-type.label: Freezer temperature
channel-type.description: Target temperature of the freezer compartment (Range depends on appliance - common range -16 to -24°C).

channel-type.label: Refrigerator super mode
channel-type.description: The setting has no impact on setpoint temperatures but will make the fridge compartment cool to the lowest possible temperature until it is disabled by the manually by the customer or by the HA because of a timeout.

channel-type.label: Freezer super mode
channel-type.description: This setting has no impact on setpoint temperatures but will make the freezer compartment cool to the lowest possible temperature until it is disabled by the manually by the customer or by the home appliance because of a timeout.

channel-type.label: Drying target
channel-type.description: Specifies the desired dryness setting.
